cast.overview: A head chef balances multiple personal and professional crises at a popular restaurant in London.
cast.title: Boiling Point

cast.overview: Bond has left active service and is enjoying a tranquil life in Jamaica. His peace is short-lived when his old friend Felix Leiter from the CIA turns up asking for help. The mission to rescue a kidnapped scientist turns out to be far more treacherous than expected, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.
cast.title: No Time to Die

details.biography: Lourdes Faberes is a British-Filipino actress and filmmaker, known for work in TV, theatre and film. She most recently played Pollution in the Amazon series Good Omens. Other recent credits include playing the assassin, `Altani' on History Channel's Knightfall, and playing the covert operative, `Michelle' Ito on NBC's series, Whiskey Cavalier. She will appear in the new Bond film, No Time To Die, due for release in April 2020. She is due to join Stephen Graham and Jason Isaacs in the British Feature Film, Boiling Point.
details.name: Lourdes Faberes
